scripts.starter: npm run copy-env src/projects/starter && next dev src/projects/starter
scripts.landing: npm run copy-env src/projects/landing && next dev src/projects/landing
scripts.orden: npm run copy-env src/projects/orden && next dev src/projects/orden
scripts.miniweb: npm run copy-env src/projects/miniweb && next dev src/projects/miniweb
scripts.chatbot: npm run copy-env src/projects/chatbot-site && next dev src/projects/chatbot-site
scripts.admin: npm run copy-env src/projects/admin && next dev src/projects/admin
scripts.globy: npm run copy-env src/projects/globy && next dev src/projects/globy
scripts.psa: npm run copy-env src/projects/psa && next dev src/projects/psa
scripts.wow: npm run copy-env src/projects/blanqueriawow && next dev src/projects/blanqueriawow
scripts.bob: npm run copy-env src/projects/bob && next dev src/projects/bob
scripts.campe: npm run copy-env src/projects/campe && next dev src/projects/campe
scripts.cosmeticos: npm run copy-env src/projects/cosmeticos && next dev src/projects/cosmeticos
scripts.muebles: npm run copy-env src/projects/muebles && next dev src/projects/muebles
scripts.readmyfcomic: npm run copy-env src/projects/readmyfcomic && next dev src/projects/readmyfcomic
scripts.guitar: npm run copy-env src/projects/guitar && next dev src/projects/guitar
scripts.deploy: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD) && node -r esm scripts/deploy $branch
scripts.deploy-win: FOR /F "tokens=*" %a in ('git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD') do SET branch=%a && node -r esm scripts/deploy %branch%
scripts.dashboard: npm run copy-env src/projects/dashboard && next dev src/projects/dashboard
scripts.carpediem: npm run copy-env src/projects/carpediem && next dev src/projects/carpediem
scripts.regazza: npm run copy-env src/projects/regazza && next dev src/projects/regazza
scripts.femelibros: npm run copy-env src/projects/femelibros && next dev src/projects/femelibros
